posts.name: Huawei P30 Pro
posts.author: Imraan Meyer
posts.description: The P30 Pro is curvy-licious with a curved backside to match its curved display; the P30 has a flat, more traditional panel.

posts.name: Huawei's IFScanner
posts.author: Imraan Meyer
posts.description: Huawei P30 is the second phone to offer a fingerprint scanner under the screen
